title: Trout with green beans and pesto
ingredients: ['8 trout fillets, about 100 g (3½ oz) each', '4 sprigs of fresh dill', '250 g (8½ oz) green beans, halved', '2 tbsp capers', '200 ml (7 fl oz) dry white wine', '300 ml (10 fl oz) hot fish stock, preferably home-made', '4 tsp plain flour', '2 tsp pesto', 'salt and pepper', 'sprigs of fresh dill to garnish']
